originalTitle: What a seventh term for 81-year-old leader means for Uganda
title: What a seventh term for 81-year-old leader means for Uganda
content: Yoweri Museveni has won a record seventh term in elections after promising that the fledgling oil sector will boost the economy.

originalTitle: I want to show the world what Africa is - YouTube star brings joy and tears on tour
title: I want to show the world what Africa is - YouTube star brings joy and tears on tour
content: "I love the love in Africa. The energy here is crazy," he says on his maiden tour of the continent.

originalTitle: Will final be Mane's last Afcon dance with Senegal?
title: Will final be Mane's last Afcon dance with Senegal?
content: Forward Sadio Mane looks to help inspire Senegal to glory against host nation Morocco after the 33-year-old said this will be his "last Afcon final".

originalTitle: Benin’s opposition loses all parliamentary seats, provisional results show
title: Benin’s opposition loses all parliamentary seats, provisional results show
content: Electoral commission says two parties aligned with President Patrice Talon win all 109 seats in the assembly.

originalTitle: Peace boards and technocrats won’t stem out Palestinian resistance
title: Peace boards and technocrats won’t stem out Palestinian resistance
content: Any governance structure that does not take into account the Palestinian national aspirations is doomed to failure.

originalTitle: Syria announces ceasefire agreement with Kurd-led SDF after heavy fighting
title: Syria announces ceasefire agreement with Kurd-led SDF after heavy fighting
content: Agreement will see government takeover of SDF controlled areas, and SDF integration into Syrian military.

originalTitle: Fears Iran's internet shutdown could lead to 'extreme digital isolation'
title: Fears Iran's internet shutdown could lead to 'extreme digital isolation'
content: Internet monitor FilterWatch warns that authorities are trying to cut the country off from international connectivity.

originalTitle: Syrian army seizes country's largest oil field from Kurdish forces
title: Syrian army seizes country's largest oil field from Kurdish forces
content: The Kurdish-led SDF militia withdrew from the Omar oil field amid an eastward push by government forces.

originalTitle: Chile declares 'state of catastrophe' as deadly wildfires menace cities
title: Chile declares 'state of catastrophe' as deadly wildfires menace cities
content: At least 16 people are confirmed dead and 20,000 are evacuated as fires rage in two southern regions.

originalTitle: Spurs chiefs consider sacking Frank as fans turn
title: Spurs chiefs consider sacking Frank as fans turn
content: Tottenham head coach Thomas Frank is under significant internal scrutiny with the club considering calling time on his seven-month reign.

originalTitle: 'No-one says anything in your face' - Martinez hits back at Scholes and Butt
title: 'No-one says anything in your face' - Martinez hits back at Scholes and Butt
content: Pundits discussing Man Utd "can talk on the television" but "no-one says anything" to your face, according to defender Lisandro Martinez.

originalTitle: Goals galore in FA Cup as Liverpool, Man Utd & Man City progress
title: Goals galore in FA Cup as Liverpool, Man Utd & Man City progress
content: Liverpool, Manchester City and Manchester United all cruise into the fifth round of the Women's FA Cup as 55 goals are scored across 12 matches on Sunday.
